title: Person of Interest 2x16 Promo "Relevance" (HD) ft. Sarah Shahi
author: televisionpromos
description:
Person of Interest 2x16 "Relevance" guest starring Sarah Shahi - A lethal and sexy government operative who tracks and stops terrorist threats before they occur finds herself on the run -- and the new focus of Reese and Finch's attention. However, their pursuit proves to be their most formidable when they discover that her remarkable skillset equals their own, on PERSON OF INTEREST, Thursday, February 21st on CBS. Series Executive Producer Jonathan Nolan directed the episode. Sarah Shahi guest stars as government operative Samantha Shaw. Subscribe to televisionpromos on YouTube for more Person of Interest season 2 promos in HD!
